name: Urban Conservation in Historical Cities
content: How about doing both, going on a #Nile\_Cruise trip abroad #Grand\_Princess, watch the magnificent Sites on the shore of the Nile River and learning through our great #CAH conference and workshop. Hurry up and join our amazing vacation program. Apply here for the #workshop & #Conference: https://goo.gl/qcFKo8 #Egypt #Luxor #Aswan
organizers: IEREK International Experts for Research Enrichment and Knowledge Exchange
